name: Suitcase Panic
description:
Open it in fullscreen, or else the screen is cut.

You got a new job at the airport!

You're in charge of giving people their suitcases, but they're not won't make it easy for you. They all have the same kinds of suitcases, so you'll have to give them according to the things they contain!

Just drag, it's as easy as that.

Made in 72h for Ludum Dare 47 ~ "Stuck in a loop" by TheInkSkeleton
